North_Little_Rock.William Woodruff House: The William Woodruff House is a historic house at 1017 East 8th Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a 2-1/2 story brick structure, with a gabled roof. A single-story porch extends across the central portion of the front, supported by Doric columns, and there is a large gable dormer projecting from the roof, housing a pair of round-arch windows and a small half-round window in the gable.
